/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, their colors muted under the cloudy sky. Cars and buses fill the street, adding to the dynamic energy of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings, which gives a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
